long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Movie Reviews & Search By D2R Internet Holdings
Configures your new tab page to Movie Reviews & Search which provides info about movies as well as links to celebrities and movies related sites.


Please read carefully: By installing the Movie Reviews & Search extension you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 
Please note that this extension provides an easy to use search option right inside your new tab extension!

http://mycoolmoviereviews.com/index.php/terms-conditions/
http://mycoolmoviereviews.com/index.php/privacy-policy/

you may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page
